lines.text: You tore the whole world right out of me, Edward.
From the moment I saw you, I knew that God doesn't hate me. He digs me.
Here I was, with a ring on my finger and this beautiful baby in my belly... and you lied to me. You might as well just dig a hole and crawl in it.
And like an asshole, I spent the money on you. Because I thought it would make you happy. And you can't put a price on that.
I bet over, it goes under. I bet under, it goes way the fuck over...
